A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
very disappointing. the battle in the beginning is well done and thrilling. 
but this good impression changes suddenly a little later. 

why is luke portrayed like this? why? this figure has influenced and inspired so many people. 
now he's just a poor weirdo on an island. and his death is just sad. ... and lame.
